headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Doomsday: The Ultimate Score
content: This is the big one. Only available to crime lords with a subterranean facility at their disposal, this is a three-act assault on every bastion of law and order in San Andreas. The risks are colossal, the rewards are unparalleled, the enemies are all but unstoppable, and the massive adrenaline spike is absolutely guaranteed. What are you waiting for? Invest in a Facility property, and wait for a familiar voice on the other end of your private line...
